prompt_purpose: Nouns DAO Wyoming DUNA Proposal Analysis

organization_structure.mission_statement: The Nouns DUNA's mission is to expand and improve civic engagement through decentralized democracy, advance the development of public goods technologies and decentralized scientific research, support the creative arts and artists, and elevate the common good through grassroots direct impact work.
organization_structure.ip_strategy: CC0 for artistic assets and public goods
organization_structure.governance: Smart contract-based democratic system with token holder voting
organization_structure.compliance: Wyoming DUNA with crypto-native operations and reporting

analysis_guidelines: Evaluate proposal against smart contract governance rules
Assess token holder rights and protections

classification_criteria.CHARITABLE: Direct public benefit activities with clear on-chain execution
classification_criteria.UNALLOWABLE: Activities incompatible with DUNA structure or public benefit

private_benefit_risk.LOW: Equitable token holder participation, clear public benefit
private_benefit_risk.MEDIUM: Limited token holder advantages, requires governance controls

implementation_complexity.HIGH: Complex technical architecture or novel mechanisms

disclaimer: This analysis represents an informed opinion on Wyoming DUNA compliance and is not legal advice.
